timeline.message:
KOGITO-1887 - Git PR template updates

- Remove need for using []
- Update link to contributors guide

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - [ ] Pull Request title is properly formatted: `KOGITO-XYZ Subject`
          
          
            
            - [ ] Pull Request title is properly formatted: `[KOGITO-XYZ] Subject`
timeline.author: ricardozanini
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,9 +2,9 @@ Many thanks for submitting your Pull Request :heart:!
 
 Please make sure that your PR meets the following requirements:
 
-- [ ] You have read the [contributors guide](https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap/blob/master/README.md)
-- [ ] Pull Request title is properly formatted: `[KOGITO-XYZ] Subject`
-- [ ] Pull Request title contains the target branch if not targeting master: `[0.9.x] [KOGITO-XYZ] Subject`
+- [ ] You have read the [contributors guide](https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-runtimes#contributing-to-kogito)
+- [ ] Pull Request title is properly formatted: `KOGITO-XYZ Subject`

replies.bodyText: @ricardozanini it was actually suggested and I think it is ok for us to not have to use [] around the jira id
replies.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: I agree. I usually use just KOGITO-XYZ: because [] eats 2 chars from the commit line. No separator may be good as well.
replies.author: evacchi
